title: LMS Utilization Strategies to Enhance Online Learning Engagement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage and LMS interface comprehension
context.additional_context: Customized learning design is essential for learners in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, emphasizing practical activities aligned with managerial/leadership roles.

learning_goals: Learners can classify their engagement levels into three tiers by analyzing LMS activity log data.
Learners can revise their weekly learning plans by over 20% based on formative assessment feedback.
Learners can utilize LMS notification settings and weekly time management features in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
